title: Create Pivot Table Easily
text: goal pivotea make pivot table easily specifying rows, columns, values split.

title: Create Pivot Table Easily
text: can install development version GitHub : can also install CRAN:

title: Create Pivot Table Easily
text: can use pivot() make pivot table easily.
code: library(pivotea) library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) hogwarts %>%   pivot(row = "hour", col = "wday", value = c("subject", "teacher", "room"), split = c("house", "grade")) #> $`1.Automatic` #> # A title: pivotea 1.0.0
